Issue.creator: avkrishnan
Issue.summary: Indy Network should be able to handle 1 million + Identities using the ledger
Issue.description: A LOCALIZED (not geographically dispersed) Sovrin Network should be able to:1. Handle a total of at least 1 million Identities using the Ledger for a verkey lookup transaction within 1 hour2. I should have local latency less than 10 milliseconds for each transaction.
